title: November’s Group Ride Membership Giveaway: Sklar Bikes Accessories, Austere Cam Straps, and a Surprise from PAUL
content:
We’ve compiled a special package from Sklar Bikes plus some of our favorite brands for a November package to one lucky Group Ride Membership supporter…

PLEASE, help keep the longest-running alt-cycling website paywall free! 

Your hard-earned money goes to supporting our independent Reportage. In doing so, you support this website’s staff and gain access to our industry-leading, private reselling platform, the Rad Bazaar!

Check this post out for all the information on how to join Group Ride for $6.66/month or $69.69/year.

SIGN UP HERE.

This month, we’ve got a bunch of fun products from some of your favorite brands, including a complete Sklar Bikes Accessories kit (two Sklar Titanium bottle cages, a Super Stem Thing of your choice and a set of PBJ bars!), laser-engraved Radavist Austere Manufacturing Cam Straps and a special gift from PAUL Component Manufacturing that’s… we’ll just say VERY unique!

Sign up by November 31st to be entered to win!

Congrats to Matt O’Donnell for winning the All-City Cosmic Stallion complete build!

The post November’s Group Ride Membership Giveaway: Sklar Bikes Accessories, Austere Cam Straps, and a Surprise from PAUL appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
